title: Quarkus 2.0.0.Alpha3 released - GraalVM 21.1, SmallRye GraphQL Client...
content: We just released our third Alpha for Quarkus 2.0 which contains several enhancements and new features: #17014 - Update to GraalVM 21.1 #17350 - SmallRye GraphQL Client extension + 1.2.1 upgrade #16857 - Add Amazon SSM extension #16963 - Add quarkus:test goal #17232 - Introduce coroutine support in Reactive Messaging...
